section.title: Building and Installing GridFTP
section.para: GridFTP is built and installed as part of a default GT version installation. For basic installation instructions, see . No extra installation steps are required for this component.

If you wish to install GridFTP without installing the rest of the Globus Toolkit, follow the instructions in the above link but just use the group install target 'globus-gridftp' with Linux native packages and make target 'gridftp' (make gridftp) with source installer.

section.title: Enabling Threading in GridFTP
section.para: In GT version the GridFTP server and the client 'globus-url-copy' are non-threaded by default. To enable threading, set the environment variable 'GLOBUS_THREAD_MODEL=pthread'. On the server, threading can be enabled using command-line option '-threads 1' as well.
